author: cnbc.com
title: Stewart Title Promotes South Carolina Native to Meet Growing Needs of Independent Agents in the Carolinas
text:
HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Stewart Title today announced the promotion of Kathryn Harrison, a 25-year industry veteran, as the Agency Service Manager in South Carolina. In addition to her responsibilities in North Carolina, she takes on the expanded role to build on the current momentum and meet the growing needs of our independent agents and agencies in South Carolina.
Harrison, a South Carolina native, assumes this role with more than two decades of experience in the title industry. In her new position, she will be responsible for partnering with our agents across both states, supporting their growing needs and strengthening relationships to better serve the residents in our communities.
Harrison’s knowledge of the state and her diverse expertise in residential and commercial real estate will enable Stewart to grow its customer base and enhance services.
“We are pleased to have Kathryn serve as the face of Stewart’s exceptional customer service in North and South Carolina,” said Jay Reed, Senior Vice President, Agency Services at Stewart Title. “Her long-standing relationship with our agents makes her a perfect fit for the role of Agency Services Manager.”
"I'm thrilled to have once again an opportunity to serve our South Carolina agents,” said Harrison. “I look forward to collaborating with them, contributing to our collective success and supporting our valued customers.”
Harrison will be relocating to South Carolina and is excited to soon call Palmetto state her home. She can be reached at (704) 249-8197, or kathryn.harrison@stewart.com .
About Stewart
Stewart Information Services Corporation (NYSE-STC) is a global real estate services company, offering products and services through our direct operations, network of Stewart Trusted Providers™ and family of companies. From residential and commercial title insurance and closing and settlement services to specialized offerings for the mortgage industry, we offer the comprehensive service, deep expertise and solutions our customers need for any real estate transaction. At Stewart, we believe in building strong relationships – and these partnerships are the cornerstone of every closing, every transaction and every deal. Stewart. Real partners. Real possibilities.™ More information is available at stewart.com , subscribe to the Stewart blog at blog.stewart.com , or follow Stewart on Twitter ® @stewarttitleco .
